component.text: Asignación de un puerto a una VLAN
Cambio de pertenencia de puertos de una VLAN

Comandos de IOS de un switch Cisco
.
Ingrese al modo de configuración global. S1# configure terminal
Elimine la asignación de la VLAN del puerto. S1(config-if)# no switchport access vlan
Vuelva al modo EXEC privilegiado. S1(config-if)# end

component.feedback: ***Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo. Los comandos que incluyen un nombre o una contraseña distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas.***
component.existingcommands: Muestre la información resumida de la VLAN.

command.deviceresponse:
VLAN Name                             Status    Ports 
---- -------------------------------- --------- ------------------------------- 
1    default                          active    Fa0/1, Fa0/2, Fa0/3, Fa0/4 
                                                Fa0/5, Fa0/6, Fa0/7, Fa0/8 
                                                Fa0/9, Fa0/10, Fa0/11, Fa0/12 
                                                Fa0/13, Fa0/14, Fa0/15, Fa0/16 
                                                Fa0/17, Fa0/19, Fa0/20, Fa0/21 
                                                Fa0/22, Fa0/23, Fa0/24, Gig1/1 
                                                Gig1/2 
20   Student                          active    Fa0/18 
1002 fddi-default                     active    
1003 token-ring-default               active    
1004 fddinet-default                  active    
1005 trnet-default                    active
S1#
command.instruction: <font size='10' class="font10px" face="Arial"><b>Elimine la interfaz f0/18 de la VLAN 20. Utilice la forma “do” del comando “show” para mostrar la información resumida de la VLAN después de haber eliminado la interfaz f0/18.</font>

command.deviceresponse: Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.

VLAN Name                             Status    Ports 
---- -------------------------------- --------- ------------------------------- 
1    default                          active    Fa0/1, Fa0/2, Fa0/3, Fa0/4 
                                                Fa0/5, Fa0/6, Fa0/7, Fa0/8 
                                                Fa0/9, Fa0/10, Fa0/11, Fa0/12 
                                                Fa0/13, Fa0/14, Fa0/15, Fa0/16 
                                                Fa0/17, Fa0/19, Fa0/20, Fa0/21 
                                                Fa0/22, Fa0/23, Fa0/24, Gig1/1 
                                                Gig1/2 
20   Student                          active     
1002 fddi-default                     active    
1003 token-ring-default               active    
1004 fddinet-default                  active    
1005 trnet-default                    active
command.instruction: Asigne la interfaz f0/11 a la VLAN 20. Vuelva directamente al modo EXEC privilegiado cuando termine.

command.deviceresponse:
S1#
*31-mar-09:34:24.3434: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
S1#
command.instruction: Muestre la información resumida de la VLAN.

command.deviceresponse:
VLAN Name                             Status    Ports 
---- -------------------------------- --------- ------------------------------- 
1    default                          active    Fa0/1, Fa0/2, Fa0/3, Fa0/4 
                                                Fa0/5, Fa0/6, Fa0/7, Fa0/8 
                                                Fa0/9, Fa0/10, Fa0/11, Fa0/12 
                                                Fa0/13, Fa0/14, Fa0/15, Fa0/16 
                                                Fa0/17, Fa0/19, Fa0/20, Fa0/21 
                                                Fa0/22, Fa0/23, Fa0/24, Gig1/1 
                                                Gig1/2 
20   Student                          active    Fa0/11 
1002 fddi-default                     active    
1003 token-ring-default               active    
1004 fddinet-default                  active    
1005 trnet-default                    active
S1#
command.instruction: <font size='10' class="font10px" face="Arial"><b>Verifique el estado del puerto de switch de la interfaz f0/18.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
Name: Fa0/18
Switchport: Enabled
Administrative Mode: static access
Operational Mode: down
Administrative Trunking Encapsulation: dot1q
Negotiation of Trunking: Off
Access Mode VLAN: 1 (default)
Trunking Native Mode VLAN: 1 (default)
command.instruction: <font size='10' class="font10px" face="Arial"><b>Cambió correctamente la pertenencia de puertos de la VLAN.</font>
